result.title: A Hard Problem !
result.content:
We have N items. A item has two edge Ai , Bi and weigh Wi. We need to connect two of them by pot two edge with the same number like linked list, we need to connect with bigest sum weigh.

1<= numbers of item <= 100; 0 <= Ai, Bi <= 3;

I think it like a graph, who can help me ?

Sorry because of my poor English@
